member.summary: When the request has not already been authenticated, this module will authenticate the user and grant the role.

member.summary: When is true, and the request has not already been authenticated, this module will authenticate the user as "LocalAdministrator" and grant all roles in .

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.NuGetDocumentationController
member.summary: Provides documentation and semantic information about various resources and actions configured for use in this application.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.NuGetDocumentationController.GetApiDocumentation
member.summary: Probably the document you are reading now.

summary.para: Shows current status for indexing activity and provides methods to manually start the synchronization process or cancel a process in flight.

The synchronization process keeps the Lucene index in sync with NuGet packages on disk by comparing package file modification times with those found in the Lucene index. Any changes that are detected are reconciled treating the package files as the authoritative data source.

Configuration settings found in Web.config control whether synchronization should start automatically when the application starts and can also enable an optional file system watcher to observe changes to package files in real time and keep the index up to date.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.IndexingController.Status
member.summary: Retrieve information about current activity as well as some statistics such as total number of packages in the repository.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.IndexingController.Synchronize
member.summary: Starts a new synchronization process if one is not already running. This method will return immediately instead of waiting for the synchronization to complete.
member.returns: 200 OK when a new process is accepted and started. 409 Conflict when a process is already running.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.IndexingController.Cancel
member.summary: Cancels a running synchronization process. This method makes no attempt to cancel a specific synchronization process or even verify that one is running. This method requests cancelation but returns immediately without waiting until process has actually ended.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.PackagesController
member.summary: Provides methods to search, get metadata, download, upload and delete packages.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.PackagesController.GetPackageInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Gets metadata about a package from the nuspec files and other metadata such as package size, date published, download counts, etc.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.PackagesController.DownloadPackage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the complete .nupkg content. The HTTP HEAD method is also supported for verifying package size, and modification date. The ETag response header will contain the md5 hash of the package content.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.PackagesController.Search(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32,NuGet.Lucene.PackageOriginFilter,NuGet.Lucene.SearchSortField,NuGet.Lucene.SearchSortDirection)
member.summary: Searches for packages that match , or if no query is provided, returns all packages in the repository.
member.param: Search terms. May include special characters to support prefix, wildcard or phrase queries.
Specify true to look for pre-release packages.
Number of results to skip, for pagination.
Number of results to return, for pagination.
Limit result to mirrored or local packages, or both.
Specify field to sort results on. Score (relevance) is default.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.PackagesController.DeletePackage(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Permanently delete a package from the repository.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.PackagesController.PutPackage(NuGet.IPackage)
member.summary: Upload a package to the repository. If a package already exists with the same Id and Version, it will be replaced with the new package.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.TabCompletionController
member.summary: Actions that enable fast tab-completion from the Package Manager Console in Visual Studio. The interface for these actions is documented at https://github.com/NuGet/NuGetGallery/wiki/Tab-Completion-API-Endpoints.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.TabCompletionController.GetMatchingPackages(System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Find packages that start with .
member.param: Flag indicating if pre-release packages should be returned (false by default)

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.TabCompletionController.GetPackageVersions(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Finds versions of a given package.
member.param: Flag indicating if pre-release package versions should be included (false by default)
member.returns: Set of available versions that match

summary.para: Provides methods to view, create and delete users and api keys for authentication.
Clients can authenticate using api keys by setting the X-NuGet-ApiKey header on requests.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.GetAllUsers
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all users.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve information about a user.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.Put(System.String,NuGet.Lucene.Web.Models.UserAttributes)
member.summary: Creates or replaces a user.
member.param: API key to set for user (optional). If not specified, a GUID will be generated and used as the key.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.Post(System.String,NuGet.Lucene.Web.Models.UpdateUserAttributes)
member.summary: Updates an existing user, optionally renaming.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.GetAuthenticationInfo
member.summary: Retrieves information about the logged-in user including name and api key. If the session has not been authenticated, returns a 206 No Content response with an empty body.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.GetRequiredAuthenticationInfo
member.summary: Retrieves information about the logged-in user including name and api key. If the request has not been authenticated, this method will force authentication to occur before retrieving information.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Controllers.UsersController.ChangeApiKey(NuGet.Lucene.Web.Models.KeyChangeRequest)
member.summary: Changes the API key of the authenticated user.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.DataServices.PackageDataSource.OpportunisticallyPrefetchPackageFromOriginWhenNecessary
member.summary:
When (a) the client is looking for a particular package version, and (b) package mirroring is enabled, and (c) the package is not in the local repository, mirror it before the query is executed.
This method enables automatic mirroring of packages during a package restore with nuget client version 2.7.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.DataServices.PackageDataService
member.summary: WCF Data Services / OData provider for Lucene based NuGet package repository.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.DataServices.HttpContextWrapperWithRequest
member.summary: Allow HttpContext.Request to be replaced with an arbitrary HttpRequestBase instance.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.DataServices.EmptyInputStreamHttpRequestWrapper
member.summary: Prevents "System.Web.HttpException (0x80004005): This method or property is not supported after HttpRequest.GetBufferlessInputStream has been invoked." from being thrown at System.Web.HttpRequest.get_InputStream().

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Formatters.MultipartFormDataMediaFormatter`1.FixIncompleteMultipartContent(System.Net.Http.HttpContent)
member.summary:
The NuGet client does not include a new line after the final boundary marker which causes to throw "Unexpected end of MIME multipart stream. MIME multipart message is not complete."
This method appends a newline to the request body when missing.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Hubs.StatusHub
member.summary: Provides SignalR powered updates as indexing activity changes. Clients can implement the updateStatus method on the status hub to receive notification when status changes.

member.name: F:NuGet.Lucene.Web.RoleNames.AccountAdministrator
member.summary: Allowed to create and delete accounts, grant and revoke roles, view and change API keys for all accounts

member.name: F:NuGet.Lucene.Web.RoleNames.PackageManager
member.summary: Allowed to create, delete or overwrite packages, explicitly synchronize packages on disk with index or cancel ongoing synchronization.

member.name: P:NuGet.Lucene.Web.RoleNames.All
member.summary: Array of all roles used by NuGet.Lucene.Web.

member.name: T:NuGet.Lucene.Web.SelectiveCamelCaseContractResolver
member.summary: Uses default contract resolver for types in the SignalR assembly and camel case for all other types.

member.name: M:NuGet.Lucene.Web.Util.TaskUtils.FireAndForget(System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: This method enables a Task to be started from asp.net 4.5 without requiring an async method to await it.
member.remarks:
When executing an async method in asp.net 4.5 associated with a request and failing to wait for the task to complete will result in an exception like the following to be thrown.
System.AggregateException: A Task's exception(s) were not observed either by Waiting on the Task or accessing its Exception property. As a result, the unobserved exception was rethrown by the finalizer thread. ---> System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. at System.Web.ThreadContext.AssociateWithCurrentThread(Boolean setImpersonationContext) at System.Web.HttpApplication.OnThreadEnterPrivate(Boolean setImpersonationContext) at System.Web.HttpApplication.System.Web.Util.ISyncContext.Enter() at System.Web.Util.SynchronizationHelper.SafeWrapCallback(Action action) at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Execute() --- End of inner exception stack trace --- ---> (Inner Exception #0) System.NullReferenceException: Object reference not set to an instance of an object. at System.Web.ThreadContext.AssociateWithCurrentThread(Boolean setImpersonationContext) at System.Web.HttpApplication.OnThreadEnterPrivate(Boolean setImpersonationContext) at System.Web.HttpApplication.System.Web.Util.ISyncContext.Enter() at System.Web.Util.SynchronizationHelper.SafeWrapCallback(Action action) at System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Execute()
